If you've downloaded anything / added anything to your classpath / etc. include the download links and installation steps you went through so that when we host this project on a server at some point we know how to do all this and don't have to relearn it.


XML Wiktionary Dump (http://dumps.wikimedia.org/backup-index.html)



Node.js - download, add node to path
MongoDB - download, npm install mongodb (if mongodb isn't in node_modules), add mongo java driver to class path (for running indexer.java)
(and running rootsToDB.java)
